mapper.insert: INSERT INTO likes (post_id, user_id, created_at) VALUES (#{postId}, #{userId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) ON CONFLICT (post_id, user_id) DO NOTHING
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM likes WHERE post_id = #{postId} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM likes WHERE post_id = #{postId} AND user_id = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM likes WHERE post_id = #{postId}
